metadata.title: CVE-2019-17382 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in zabbix.php?action=dashboard.view&dashboardid=1in Zabbix through 4.4. An attacker can bypass the login page and access thedashboard page, and then create a Dashboard, Report, Screen, or Map withoutany Username/Password (i.e., anonymously). All created elements(Dashboard/Report/Screen/Map) are accessible by other users and by anadmin.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
